Social Return on Investment (SROI) is a method of calculating and communicating estimated impact using dollar values. SROI estimates the social value created by an organization’s activities, products, services or community initiatives. SROI combines social, economic, and environmental impacts into a comprehensive financial measurement of social value in a holistic estimate of impact.
